author.description: Artist, Architect, Biophiliac, Phygital Art - Santo Domingo, DR.. BS GATech, MArch Columbia University

text:
Love this channel!!! thank you @vortac  and @paul-prudence  for hosting it!!! After half a life avoiding the computer( for reasons I do not understand) I am
now obsessed with computer art. If only I had payed more attention to the TRS-80 my dad bought for me when I was a little kidâ€¦.
